name: UserConfigurationRequestedMessage
template:
Upload a ZIP archive with extended configuration files

If you're unsure about the configuration or where to find an example, a detailed description can be found in the advanced settings

name: UserConfigurationSubmittedMessage
template:
Settings saved. They will be applied during book conversion

If there's an STK section in the configuration, it will also be considered

name: UserConfigurationRemovedMessage
template:
Configuration removed. Default settings will be applied during file conversion

After converting the book, you can still send them to your E-Mail.

name: MainScreenRequestedMessage
template:
Kindle Sideload Tool 
Author: @maxgrakov
This is an unofficial way to upload books in fb2 format to Amazon Kindle without losing quality. Click the "Convert Book" button and upload the file

name: SettingsScreenRequestedMessage
template: Here you can configure the conversion and file sending parameters

name: ConversationPromptMessage
template: Upload a book in fb2 format to convert it into a Kindle-compatible format

name: ProjectInfoMessage
template: Unfortunately, Kindle reading devices do not support FB2, and most EPUB files from bookstores are converted by Amazon services with significant losses I created this service to solve both problems at once: now you can quickly get quality converted books on Kindle, with preserved page layout, margins, indents, and fonts I tried to make the service's use not too different from using the official Kindle app from Google Play or App Store, and I hope I succeeded The service will remain free and available to all users without restrictions as long as possible ___ The project uses the fb2converter under the GPL-3.0 license, and I would like to thank the author for his work The service is distributed under the MIT license, the source codes are available here ___ Please use the service for good and do not deprive authors of the opportunity to earn from their books If you want to support the service, contact @maxgrakov and we'll find a way Sincerely, Max Grakov

name: AdvancedConfigurationMessage
template:
Here you can upload an archive with book settings.

This will allow you to modify parameters such as font, margins, and more.

The "STK" section will also be applied if it's correctly configured.

name: ConverterDefaultConfigurationMessage
template:
A file with the default configuration has been sent.

It contains basic parameters that are easy to customize. Upload the modified file back after making changes.

name: DebugSettingsMessage
template:
Here you can enable or disable detailed conversion reports.

This might be useful for configuration debugging.

name: DisableDebugSettingsMessage
template: Detailed reports are disabled.

name: EnableDebugSettingsMessage
template: Detailed reports are enabled.

name: OutputTypeSettingsMessage
template: Here you can choose the format you want to receive the file in after conversion.

name: SetOutputTypeMessage
template: File format has been set.

name: StkScreenMessage
template: Here you can configure the sending of books to E-Mail after conversion.

name: UpdateEmailUpdatedMessage
template:
The E-Mail to which files will be sent after conversion has been updated. Click the "Send to email" button to receive the files.

Don't forget to add the E-Mail sideload@grakovne.org to the trusted list so that books arrive automatically.

You can read more about how to do this here: 

https://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html?nodeId=GX9XLEVV8G4DB28H

name: UpdateEmailPromptMessage
template: Send the E-Mail to which you want to receive books after conversion. After that, don't forget to set it up on the reading device.

name: StkSuccessMessage
template: Files have been sent to E-Mail. Their processing by Kindle services may take some time.

name: StkFailedMessage
template:
Something went wrong, and the files couldn't be sent to E-Mail. If you didn't set E-Mail yet, it could be done in the Settings

If E-Mail set already, please contact @maxgrakov.

name: StkSubmittedMessage
template: Sending. Everything will be ready in a few seconds.
